mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
SELECT r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username = #{username}

SELECT p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
